vouch.title: Vouch
vouch.description: As part of the web team at Vouch, I worked on sign-in, sponsorship, and document upload flows. The role involved some interaction with ruby and using coffeescript and backbone for the front end.

studyblue.title: StudyBlue
studyblue.description: StudyBlue is a startup focused on helping students learn with a flashcard app for web and mobile. While there, I was the go-between for design and engineering and was part of a complete site redesign.
